Translations.Text: Hoc scripture est infallible; beacon pro the righteous
Qui believe in unseen observe Contact Prayers (Salat) ex noster provisions to them they dedit charity
they believe in quod revealed vos in quod revealed ante vos regard Hereafter they est absolutely certain
These est guided de their Dominus; these est winners
Prout pro those disbelieve est the same them; whether vos warn them non warn them they non believe
DEUS SIGILLUM their minds their hearing their eyes veiled They incurred severe retribution
